attributes.action: 2013 Rugby League World Cup TV accessibility.
attributes.additional_details: The 2013 RL World Cup starts on Saturday 26th October. Only 7 of the 28 games are accessible to all on the BBC. All other games are being shown on Premier Sports channel only available to Sky subscribers and at a monthly fee. As a competition of national and international importance this is unacceptable, it make the RLWC an elitist viewing competition. The BBC should show all the games, if only in an highlights format on one of its 4 channels as a matter of public interest.
